onset.Description: Time the object appeared on screen

duration.Description: Time the object remained on screen

Levels.learning: A random walk drawn from the temporal community graph

community.Description: The community of the current object

object.Description: The node of the current object

object_type.Description: Node type of the object in the graph

Levels.central: A central node within a community
Levels.boundary: A node connecting to another community

response.Description: Response to the rotation detection task

response_time.Description: Time of response to rotation decision
